plays.text: Penalty to Sean Avery 2 minutes for Holding Scott Nichol
Penalty to Stephane Yelle 2 minutes for Interference Igor Larionov
Goal scored by Brendan Shanahan assisted by Darren McCarty and Sean Avery
Penalty to Rob Niedermayer 2 minutes for Hooking Sean Avery
Penalty to Mathieu Dandenault 2 minutes for Hooking Scott Nichol
Goal scored by Craig Conroy assisted by Scott Nichol and Robyn Regehr
Goal scored by Henrik Zetterberg assisted by Jason Woolley and Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Maxim Kuznetsov 2 minutes for Slashing Steve Begin
Penalty to Denis Gauthier 2 minutes for Crosschecking Tomas Holmstrom
Goal scored by Sean Avery unassisted
Penalty to Jesse Wallin 2 minutes for Tripping Blake Sloan
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Toni Lydman and Craig Conroy
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brett Hull and Nicklas Lidstrom
